title: 求问怎么禁用warp  不准别人用
author: visio_R..

replies.author: Bryan33
replies.txt_content:
如果essentials有设置简化权限的话
/manuaddp [名字] -warp  组:/mangaddp [组名] -warp
没有就是/manuaddp [名字] -essentials.warp 组:/mangaddp [组名] -essentials.warp
ess插件 分组权限那把warp的权限禁掉

replies.author: visio_R..
replies.txt_content:
a390807154 发表于 2015-7-16 17:07
如果essentials有设置简化权限的话
/manuaddp [名字] -warp  组:/mangaddp [组名] -warp
没有就是/manuadd ...
如何统一  不准用  WARP

replies.author: Bryan33
replies.txt_content:
visio_R.. 发表于 2015-7-16 17:11
如何统一  不准用  WARP
你的玩家是在什么组的
一般builder就把上面命令的组名换成builder

replies.author: SILY
replies.txt_content: 来来我教你 就打 /mangdelp Builder essentials.warp 就可以了 求采纳谢谢谢谢

replies.author: Bryan33
replies.txt_content:
